items.sentence: Tom started to feel like his life wasn\'t worth living.
Tom didn\'t let Mary finish what she was trying to say.
I think I can complete the project by Monday afternoon.
I think doctors will eventually find a cure for cancer.
Tom doesn\'t know for certain what Mary is going to do.
Spending time with your family should be your priority.
The boss considered firing Tom, but decided against it.
The crane, unlike the dog, has never dreamed of flying.
Tom\'s parents didn\'t allow him to watch Harry Potter.
Despite repeated warnings, Tom didn\'t stop doing that.
